alert.note: Alert for Kittson (Minnesota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Eastern ND and Grand Forks (Northeastern North Dakota and Northwestern Minnesota)
info.headline: Flood Warning issued April 16 at 12:09PM CDT until further notice by NWS Eastern ND and Grand Forks
info.description: ...The National Weather Service in Grand Forks ND has issued a Flood Warning for the following rivers in North Dakota...Minnesota... Red River of the North at Pembina affecting Pembina and Kittson Counties. Red River of the North at Drayton affecting Pembina, Walsh, Kittson and Marshall Counties. .Snowmelt continues across the Red River basin, with meltwater slower to reach the river system in spots. Overall, river responses will become more widespread in the coming days, even with temperatures trending toward normal to below normal through early next week as snowpack temperatures are nearing freezing across much of the basin. The rate of rise and ultimate crest remains uncertain due to forecast temperatures, ongoing snowmelt runoff, and additional precipitation chances expected toward the middle of next week. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov. ...FLOOD WARNING FOR SNOWMELT IN EFFECT FROM THURSDAY EVENING UNTIL FURTHER NOTICE... * WHAT...Minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Red River of the North at Pembina. * WHEN...From Thursday evening until further notice. * IMPACTS...At 44.0 feet, MODERATE FLOOD. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 11:30 AM CDT Sunday the stage was 25.2 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise above flood stage late Thursday evening and continue rising to 42.9 feet Sunday morning. - Flood stage is 39.0 feet. &&
info.instruction: Safety message - Turn around, don`t drown. Don`t travel through flooded areas. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Please report observed flooding to local emergency services or law enforcement and request they pass this information to the National Weather Service when you can do so safely.
